radiographic_examinations.findings: Posterior vitreous detachment; no retinal detachment or vitreitis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Ultrasonography results from the left eye were negative except for posterior vitreous detachment.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic Resonance Imaging and Computed Tomography
radiographic_examinations.findings: Significant white matter changes consistent with multiple ischemic microvascular infarcts in the brain.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Negative results except for posterior vitreous detachment.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Acanthamoeba cysts in the cornea, diffuse neuroretinal ischemia, perivascular lymphocytic infiltrates, and chronic chorioretinal inflammation.
Cysts in the recipient cornea; evidence of total retinal detachment and severe vitreitis.
Acanthamoeba cysts and trophozoites in cornea and evidence of chronic inflammation.
